----

-        label: "dbg",
-        kind: None,
-        detail: None,
-        documentation: None,
-        lookup: None,
-        insert_text: Some(

-            "!bar"

-            TextEdit {
-                atoms: [
-                    AtomTextEdit {
-                        delete: [72; 76),
-                        insert: ""
-                    }
-                ]
-            }
-        )
-    },
-    CompletionItem {

-        label: "while",
